thread.title: Rosario Dawson models wide pants as she opens first store | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Rosario Dawson models wide pants as she opens first store | Daily Mail Online

author: Bobbie Whiteman For Mailonline
title: Rosario Dawson models wide pants as she opens first store | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share The socially conscious company, based in Ghana and the US, promotes African and African-inspired clothing often made by their own artisans. 'We focus on empowerment, creating jobs and supporting education and skills training,' is the message on their website. Come on and party: The 37-year-old actress announced the store's opening on Instagram Dressing up: The pals both wore items from their brand, which is based in Ghana and New York, and promotes fashions and other items made by African workers Thanks for coming: The brunette cosied up with One Management founder Scott Lipps It's a high-end range with similar pants to the ones that Rosario modelled selling for between $325 to $525. But since the proceeds are going to such a good cause, buyers appear to be flocking to the site and many items have already sold out online. Rosario and Abrima partied with a variety of friends and backers on Thursday. Air kisses: Sharifa Murdoch, co-founder of Liberty Fairs Tradeshow for menswear dropped in Cheers! The Daredevil hugged Aleksey Kernes, co-founder of subscription-based cocktail app Hooch, which sponsored the party They included co-founder of the Liberty Fairs Tradeshow for menswear, Sharifa Murdock; founder of One Management, Scott Lipps; and celebrity snapper Antoine Verglas. Missing from the bash was Rosario's new beau 33-year-old comedian Eric Andres. They came out as a couple on Valentine's Day in a series on Instagram snaps. Sealed with a lick: Rosario and her new beau, 33-year-old comedian Eric Andres, confirmed their romance in a series of Instagram snaps on Valentine's Day Share or comment on this article 113
